mapper.select: select s.id,s.name,s.update_flag_app,s.update_flag_screen from house_template_scene s where s.house_template_id = #{templageId}
SELECT s.id,s.name,s.icon,s.hvac_flag from house_template_scene s where s.id = #{sceneId}

SELECT f.NAME AS floorMame, r.NAME AS roomName, d.id as deviceId, d.name as deviceName, d.product_id, sa.device_sn , sa.val, sa.attribute_id, C.code FROM house_template_scene_action sa, house_template_device d, house_template_room r, house_template_floor f, home_auto_category C WHERE sa.scene_id = #{id} and d.house_template_id = #{houseTemplateId} AND sa.device_sn = d.sn AND d.category_id = C.ID AND d.room_id = r.ID AND r.floor_id = f.ID

SELECT hc.device_sn, hc.switch_val as syswitch, ha.mode_val, ha.wind_val, ha.room_flag, ha.switch_val, ha.temperature_val, hp.device_sn psn, hp.switch_val as pswitch, hp.temperature_val as ptemperature FROM house_scene_hvac_config hc left join house_scene_hvac_action ha on hc.id = ha.hvac_config_id left join house_scene_hvac_panel_action hp on ha.id = hp.hvac_action_id WHERE hc.scene_id = #{sceneId}
